STATE v. PATTERSON No. COA06-1305 Court of Appeals of North Carolina Filed May 1, 2007 Certification Date May 21, 2007 Appeal from Alamance (05CRS58467, 05CRS61663, 06CRS50994, 06CRS51686, 06CRS52080, 06CRS3929, 06CRS3930, 06CRS3931).
